publisher.value: Health Level Seven Australia (Patient Administration WG)

description.value: Extended value set of identifier types for use in an Australian context. Includes HL7 international codes plus Australian additions to create a complete set. NOTE: codes contained LACN Laboratory Accession ID and ACN Accession ID are exclusive concepts and not consider related in this terminology.
